Class Backpressure

java.lang.Object
com.quietterminal.projectneon.core.Backpressure
public final class Backpressure extends Object
Backpressure signaling for flow control between Neon components. Tracks queue depths, processing rates, and notifies listeners when thresholds are exceeded.

Usage: 

Backpressure bp = Backpressure.create()
    .setHighWaterMark(1000)
    .setLowWaterMark(100);

bp.addListener(signal -> {
    if (signal.shouldPause()) {
        pauseSending();
    } else {
        resumeSending();
    }
});

bp.recordEnqueue();
bp.recordDequeue();
Since:
1.1
